messages: %PLAYER%, wait.

Bert? But how did you get in? I thought
none of you could pass the gate!
I remembered back door. But....

No. I can go no further. I could, once.
Perhaps.

%PLAYER%, I must not stay long. But I
must tell you this. Is important.
Something is wrong.

That book we wanted to give you... it was
not gone yesterday. It was on shelf, in
library.
It is only gone today. This morning.

What? What are you saying? The book only
went missing this morning?
Yes. I am sure of it.

%PLAYER%, something wants to stop you.
Or delay you.

Are we too late, then? Is the Big Bad
here?
No. We would know. Big Bad would not hide.

But perhaps he can still reach into our
village. Small hacks. Subtle things.

Perhaps he left traps. Protocols. Magic
that waits for his signal before working.
I once knew more. But I am old, and....

I must go. There is something I must
learn. Quickly. But I will return.
Do not wait for me. Go and get artifact.

If I find answer, I will leave message
with XA.
Good luck.
